name: Contact Form Submission
description: Fill and submit a standard contact form
instructions:
Fill and submit the contact form:
1. Wait for the form to be fully loaded
2. Click on the Name field and type "{name}"
3. Click on the Email field and type "{email}"
4. Click on the Subject field and type "{subject}"
5. Click on the Message field and type "{message}"
6. If there's a phone field, type "{phone}"
7. Check any required checkboxes (like terms acceptance)
8. Click the Submit or Send button
9. Wait for confirmation message or redirect
10. Extract the confirmation text, ticket number, or reference ID if shown

message.example: I would like more information about your services.

validation.success_indicator: confirmation message or thank you page

notes: Form field names may vary across different websites
Some forms may have CAPTCHA protection
Check for GDPR consent checkboxes on EU sites
